mapper.select: SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%' order by COMMUNITY_ID

SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID ,comm.COMMUNITY_DATE FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%' order by COMMUNITY_ID limit #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale} ;
